info.title: Synapse Protocol REST API
info.description: API documentation for the Synapse Protocol REST API

get.summary: Get quotes for bridging tokens between chains
get.description: Retrieve list of bridge quotes based on origin and destination chains, tokens, and amount. Any origin token can be used, but destination tokens must be supported on the destination chain.

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: The origin chain ID (must support intents)

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the origin chain

parameters.name: fromAmount
parameters.description: The amount of tokens to bridge in the token's native decimals

parameters.name: fromSender
parameters.description: The address of the user on the origin chain (required to generate callData)

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: The destination chain ID

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the destination chain

parameters.name: toRecipient
parameters.description: The destination address for the bridge transaction (required to generate callData)

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum allowed slippage percentage (0-100). Defaults to 0.5%.

fromChainId.description: The ID of the origin chain

fromToken.description: The address of the token on the origin chain

fromAmount.description: The amount of tokens to bridge in the token's native decimals

toChainId.description: The ID of the destination chain

toToken.description: The address of the token on the destination chain

expectedToAmount.description: The expected amount of tokens that will be received in the token's native decimals

minToAmount.description: The minimum amount of tokens that will be received in the token's native decimals (includes slippage)

routerAddress.description: The address of the router contract

estimatedTime.description: Estimated time for the bridge in seconds

moduleName.description: The name of the bridge module used for this quote

gasDropAmount.description: Amount of native token airdropped on destination chain (in native token decimals)

callData.description: Transaction data object, only provided if fromSender and toRecipient parameters were included

value.description: Amount of native currency to send with transaction (in native token decimals)

example.error: An unexpected error occurred in /bridge/v2. Please try again later.

get.summary: Get min/max origin values for bridge quote
get.description: Retrieve min/max bridgeable amounts to bridge from source chain to destination chain. Returns null for min/max amounts if limits are unavailable.

parameters.name: fromChain
parameters.description: The source chain ID.

parameters.name: toChain
parameters.description: The destination chain ID.

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the source chain.

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the destination chain.

200.description: Successful response containing min and max origin amounts.

maxOriginAmount.description: Maximum amount of tokens that can be bridged from the origin chain.

minOriginAmount.description: Minimum amount of tokens that can be bridged from the origin chain.

get.summary: Get quotes for bridging tokens between chains
get.description: Retrieve list of detailed bridge quotes based on origin and destination chains based on tokens and amount

parameters.name: fromChain
parameters.description: The source chain ID

parameters.name: toChain
parameters.description: The destination chain ID

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the source chain

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the destination chain

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of tokens to bridge

parameters.name: originUserAddress
parameters.description: The address of the user on the origin chain

parameters.name: destAddress
parameters.description: The destination address of the user on the destination chain

parameters.name: toChain

parameters.name: amount

parameters.name: destAddress
parameters.description: The destination address for the bridged tokens

parameters.name: originUserAddress
parameters.description: The address of the user on the origin chain

to.description: The address of the contract to interact with

value.description: The amount of native currency to send with the transaction

get.description: Used to get the status of a bridge transaction, and the destination transaction information if the transaction is finalized

parameters.name: destChainId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination chain

parameters.name: bridgeModule
parameters.description: The bridge module used for the transaction

parameters.name: synapseTxId
parameters.description: The Synapse transaction ID

txnHash.description: The transaction hash on the destination chain

USDValue.description: The USD value of the transaction

tokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token transferred

formattedTime.description: The formatted time of the transaction

formattedValue.description: The formatted value of the transaction

get.summary: Get possible destination tokens for a bridge
get.description: Retrieve possible destination tokens for a given source chain ID and token address

parameters.name: fromChain
parameters.description: The source chain ID

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token on the source chain

chainId.description: The chain ID where the token is available

parameters.name: originChainId

parameters.name: txHash

txnHash.description: The transaction hash on the destination chain

USDValue.description: The USD value of the transaction

tokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token transferred

blockNumber.description: The block number of the transaction

formattedTime.description: The formatted time of the transaction

tokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token transferred

get.description: Retrieve general information about the Synapse REST API, including available chains and tokens

id.description: Chain ID of the blockchain network

availableTokens.description: List of available tokens across different chains

chains.description: List of chains where the token is available

chainId.description: Chain ID where the token is available

address.description: Token contract address on the specific chain

example.message: Welcome to the Synapse REST API for swap and bridge quotes

get.summary: Get swap quote for tokens on a specific chain
get.description: Retrieve detailed swap quote for exchanging one token for another on a specified chain

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chain ID where the swap will occur

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap from

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap to

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of tokens to swap

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the user

routerAddress.description: The address of the router contract

maxAmountOut.description: The maximum amount of tokens that will be received

swapAdapter.description: The address of the swap adapter

tokenOut.description: The address of the token being received

get.summary: Get swap quote for arbitrary tokens on a specific chain
get.description: Retrieve detailed swap quote exchanging any token for any other on a specified chain. Note that amounts are expressed in token's native decimals, not in human-readable format.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: The chain ID where the swap will occur

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap from

parameters.name: fromAmount
parameters.description: The amount of tokens to swap in the token's native decimals

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap to

parameters.name: toRecipient
parameters.description: Optional. The address that will receive the swapped tokens. If provided, returns transaction data.

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum allowed slippage percentage (0-100). Defaults to 0.5%.

chainId.description: The chain ID where the swap occurs

fromToken.description: The address of the token being swapped from

fromAmount.description: The amount of tokens to swap in the token's native decimals

toToken.description: The address of the token being swapped to

expectedToAmount.description: The expected amount of tokens that will be received in the token's native decimals

minToAmount.description: The minimum amount of tokens that will be received in the token's native decimals (includes slippage)

routerAddress.description: The address of the router contract

moduleName.description: The name of the module used for the swap

callData.description: Transaction data object, only provided if toRecipient parameter was included

value.description: Amount of native currency to send with transaction (in native token decimals)

example.error: An unexpected error occurred in /swap/v2. Please try again later.

get.summary: [Deprecated] in favor of using the /swap endpoint, which now returns call data
get.description: [Deprecated] Originally used to get Swap transaction information

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chain ID where the swap will occur

parameters.name: fromToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap from

parameters.name: toToken
parameters.description: The address of the token to swap to

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of tokens to swap

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The Ethereum address of the user performing the swap

to.description: The address of the contract to interact with

value.description: The amount of native currency to send with the transaction

get.description: Retrieve the Synapse transaction ID for a given origin chain transaction

parameters.name: originChainId
parameters.description: The ID of the origin chain where the transaction was initiated

parameters.name: bridgeModule
parameters.description: The bridge module used for the transaction

parameters.name: txHash
parameters.description: The transaction hash on the origin chain

error.message: Invalid bridge module. Must be one of: SynapseRFQ, SynapseBridge, SynapseCCTP

get.summary: Get the list of bridgeable tokens & associated chain metadata
get.description: Retrieve the complete list of tokens that can be bridged across different chains
Retrieves a list of transactions where the relayer in the proof differs from the relayer in the relay event
Retrieves a list of all active disputes
Retrieves a list of recent invalid relay events from the past 2 weeks
Retrieves a list of transactions that have been deposited, relayed, and proven, but not yet claimed

404.description: No pending transactions missing claim found

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions that have been deposited and relayed, but not yet proven

404.description: No pending transactions missing proof found

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions that have been deposited, but not yet relayed or refunded

404.description: No pending transactions missing relay found

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions that have been deposited, but not yet relayed or refunded and have exceeded the deadline

404.description: No pending transactionst that exceed the deadline found

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions that have been both refunded and relayed

404.description: No refunded and relayed transactions found

get.summary: Get transaction details by ID or the origin transaction hash
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a transaction, including deposit, relay, proof, claim, and refund data if available

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction or the origin transaction hash

put.description: cache an ack request to synchronize relayer actions.

contracts.description: Contracts is a map of chain id to contract address

dest_amount.description: DestAmount is the max amount of liquidity which exists for a given destination token, provided in the destination token decimals

dest_chain_id.description: DestChainID is the chain which the relayer is willing to relay to

dest_fast_bridge_address.description: DestFastBridgeAddress is the address of the fast bridge contract on the destination chain

dest_token_addr.description: DestToken is the token address for which the relayer willing to relay to

fixed_fee.description: FixedFee is the fixed fee for the quote, provided in the destination token terms

max_origin_amount.description: MaxOriginAmount is the maximum amount of origin tokens bridgeable

origin_chain_id.description: OriginChainID is the chain which the relayer is willing to relay from

origin_fast_bridge_address.description: OriginFastBridgeAddress is the address of the fast bridge contract on the origin chain

origin_token_addr.description: OriginTokenAddr is the token address for which the relayer willing to relay from

relayer_addr.description: Address of the relayer providing the quote

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is the time that the quote was last upserted
